overview: "Under the Underground" guides us through the improvised spaces of Janka Industries, an underground cellar vault and creative microcosm of Vienna's subculture. Voodoo JÃ¼rgens and Bands such as Petra und der Wolf and Tankris practice and perform here in the midst of a bizarre hodge-podge of electronic scrap. A music film and an ultimate underground homage that cinematically captures the magic of the site.
title: Under the Underground
